## CircularDoublyLinkedList.insertAfter() method

Insert a new node with value `value` immediately after `mark`<!-- -->. If `mark` is not an element of the list, the list is not modified. `mark` must not be null.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
insertAfter(value: T, mark: Node<T, CircularDoublyLinkedList<T>>): Node<T, CircularDoublyLinkedList<T>> | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | T | The value with which to instantiate the inserted node |
|  mark | Node&lt;T, [CircularDoublyLinkedList](./connective-tissue.circulardoublylinkedlist.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt; | A node in the list before which to insert the new node |

<b>Returns:</b>

Node&lt;T, [CircularDoublyLinkedList](./connective-tissue.circulardoublylinkedlist.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt; \| null
